org.apache.hama.bsp

Interface OutputFormat<K,V>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileOutputFormat, NullOutputFormat, SequenceFileOutputFormat, TextOutputFormat

    public interface OutputFormat<K,V>

    • Method Detail

      • getRecordWriter

        RecordWriter<K,V> getRecordWriter(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem fs,
                                BSPJob job,
                                String name)
                                  throws IOException
        Get the RecordWriter for the given job.
        Parameters:
        fs -
        job - configuration for the job whose output is being written.
        name - the unique name for this part of the output.
        Returns:
        a RecordWriter to write the output for the job.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • checkOutputSpecs

        void checkOutputSpecs(org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem ignored,
                    BSPJob job)
                      throws IOException
        Check for validity of the output-specification for the job.

        This is to validate the output specification for the job when it is a job is submitted. Typically checks that it does not already exist, throwing an exception when it already exists, so that output is not overwritten.

        Parameters:
        ignored -
        job - job configuration.
        Throws:
        IOException - when output should not be attempted
